data.eml:eml: A new species of Protonemura Kempny, 1898 (Plecoptera: Nemouridae) from the French and Swiss Jura Mountains

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reding, Jean-Paul G., Bolard, Audrey, Vinçon, Gilles (2017): A new species of Protonemura Kempny, 1898 (Plecoptera: Nemouridae) from the French and Swiss Jura Mountains. Zootaxa 4276 (4): 554-568, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4276.4.7
